attributes.action: Add the option of voting for "None of the Above" on all future ballot papers.
attributes.additional_details:
By allowing "None of the Above" to be added to the ballot paper it would give the voters an option to show their displeasure at the candidates put in front of them. 

Should "None of the Above" have more votes than any other candidate then the election in that constituency would have to be re-run with all new candidates.
attributes.background: Whether Remain or Leave the last three years have shown that many MP's are not fit for purpose. At any election the choice is of a limited amount of names representing either themselves or a specific national party. We often vote to support our party for someone we either do not know or like.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Eleanor Laing MP
